name: patient_id
description: Unique patient identifier

name: policy_id_LCD
description: Local Coverage Determination (LCD) identifier

name: diagnosis_obstructive_sleep_apnea_flag
description: Diagnosis of Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA)

name: procedure_hypoglossal_nerve_stimulation_flag
description: Indicates if Hypoglossal Nerve Stimulation is performed

name: comorbidity_hypertension_flag
description: Presence of comorbidity: hypertension (associated with OSA)

name: comorbidity_cardiovascular_disease_flag
description: Presence of comorbidity: cardiovascular disease (associated with OSA)

name: comorbidity_cardiac_arrhythmia_flag
description: Presence of comorbidity: cardiac arrhythmia (associated with OSA)

name: comorbidity_cerebrovascular_disease_flag
description: Presence of comorbidity: cerebrovascular disease (associated with OSA)

name: comorbidity_excessive_daytime_sleepiness_flag
description: Presence of comorbidity: excessive daytime sleepiness (associated with OSA)

name: comorbidity_mood_disorders_flag
description: Presence of comorbidity: mood disorders (associated with OSA)

name: device_battery_life_years
description: Battery life of the implantable HGNS device components in years (7 to 10 years)

name: patient_age
description: Patient age in years (must be 22 or older for HGNS)

name: patient_bmi
description: Patient Body Mass Index in kg/m2 (must be less than 35 for HGNS)

name: polysomnography_performed_window_months
description: Time window within which a polysomnography (PSG) must be performed prior to first HGNS consultation (24 months)

name: polysomnography_performed_flag
description: Indicates if a polysomnography (PSG) was performed within the required window

name: central_mixed_apnea_percentage_AHI
description: Percentage of central and mixed apneas relative to total AHI (must be less than 25% for HGNS)

name: apnea_hypopnea_index_AHI
description: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (AHI) in events per hour (must be between 15 and 65 for HGNS)

name: cpap_failure_AHI
description: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (AHI) indicating CPAP failure (greater than 15 despite CPAP usage)

name: cpap_intolerance_usage_hours_per_night
description: CPAP usage in hours per night (less than 4 hours indicates intolerance)

name: cpap_intolerance_usage_nights_per_week
description: CPAP usage in nights per week (less than 5 nights indicates intolerance)

name: cpap_intolerance_returned_flag
description: Flag indicating if CPAP device was returned due to intolerance

name: cpap_intolerance_flag
description: Flag indicating CPAP intolerance, requiring consultation with a sleep expert for shared decision making

name: complete_concentric_collapse_soft_palate_flag
description: Absence of complete concentric collapse at the soft palate level (evaluated via DISE)

name: drug_induced_sleep_endoscopy_DISE_performed_flag
description: Indicates if a drug-induced sleep endoscopy (DISE) procedure was performed

name: tonsil_size
description: Tonsil size per standardized tonsillar hypertrophy grading scale (sizes 3 or 4 are contraindications for HGNS)

name: anatomical_findings_compromising_device_flag
description: Flag indicating presence of anatomical findings that would compromise HGNS device performance

name: hgns_fda_approved_flag
description: Indicates if the Hypoglossal Nerve Neurostimulation system is FDA-approved

name: other_implantable_device_flag
description: Presence of other implantable devices that could interact with HGNS system

name: neuromuscular_disease_flag
description: Presence of neuromuscular disease

name: hypoglossal_nerve_palsy_flag
description: Presence of hypoglossal-nerve palsy

name: severe_pulmonary_disease_flag
description: Presence of severe restrictive or obstructive pulmonary disease

name: pulmonary_arterial_hypertension_flag
description: Presence of moderate-to-severe pulmonary arterial hypertension

name: severe_valvular_heart_disease_flag
description: Presence of severe valvular heart disease

name: nyha_heart_failure_class
description: New York Heart Association (NYHA) heart failure class (Class III or IV is a contraindication)

name: recent_cardiac_event_window_months
description: Time window for recent myocardial infarction or severe cardiac arrhythmias (within the past 6 months is a contraindication)

name: myocardial_infarction_flag
description: Presence of recent myocardial infarction (within past 6 months is a contraindication)

name: severe_cardiac_arrhythmias_flag
description: Presence of severe cardiac arrhythmias (within past 6 months is a contraindication)

name: uncontrolled_hypertension_flag
description: Presence of persistent uncontrolled hypertension despite medication use

name: serious_mental_illness_ADLs_flag
description: Presence of active, serious mental illness affecting ADLs and ability to operate HNS

name: coexisting_nonrespiratory_sleep_disorders_flag
description: Presence of coexisting nonrespiratory sleep disorders confounding functional sleep assessment

name: pregnancy_flag
description: Patient is pregnant or plans to become pregnant

name: mri_compatibility_model_3024_flag
description: HGNS device model 3024 is incompatible with MRI

name: mri_compatibility_model_3028_flag
description: HGNS device model 3028 has limited MRI compatibility (head and extremities only)

name: sleep_remote_operation_ability_flag
description: Patient's ability or assistance to operate the HGNS sleep remote

name: compromised_upper_airway_neurological_control_flag
description: Presence of conditions/procedures compromising neurological control of the upper airway

name: dise_provider_certification_flag
description: Provider certification for Drug Induced Sleep Endoscopy (DISE) by FDA approved manufacturer's second opinion service

name: dise_certification_agreement_percentage
description: Minimum agreement percentage for DISE provider certification (at least 80%)

name: dise_certification_consecutive_studies
description: Minimum number of consecutive studies for DISE provider certification (at least 15)

name: shared_decision_making_documented_flag
description: Documentation of shared decision making between attending provider and patient

name: physician_qualification_otolaryngologist_board_certified_eligible_flag
description: Physician must be board certified or eligible otolaryngologist for HGNS insertion

name: physician_qualification_otolaryngology_residency_flag
description: Physician must have completed AMA or AOA certified otolaryngology residency program for HGNS insertion

name: surgeon_training_device_implant_flag
description: Surgeon training by FDA-approved device manufacturer on implant techniques and cadaver training

name: sleep_physician_technician_training_device_titration_flag
description: Sleep physician/technician training on device titration and operation

name: provider_training_documentation_flag
description: Provider must maintain documentation of training completion

name: sleep_physician_qualification_board_certified_eligible_flag
description: Sleep physician must be board eligible or certified for HGNS evaluation/referral/post-implant evaluation

name: sleep_technician_qualification_L34040_flag
description: Sleep technicians must meet qualifications outlined in LCD L34040

name: sleep_facility_accreditation_flag
description: Sleep studies must be performed in an accredited sleep facility

name: oxygen_desaturation_index_ODI
description: Oxygen Desaturation Index (ODI), number of times per hour blood oxygen drops >= 4 percentage points (used in study outcomes)

name: ahi_reduction_percentage_post_treatment
description: Percentage reduction in AHI score from baseline post-treatment (at least 50% indicates treatment response in studies)

name: ahi_post_treatment
description: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (AHI) post-treatment (less than 20 events per hour indicates treatment response in studies)

name: odi_reduction_percentage_post_treatment
description: Percentage reduction in Oxygen Desaturation Index (ODI) score from baseline post-treatment (at least 25% indicates treatment response in studies)

name: epworth_sleepiness_scale_score
description: Epworth Sleepiness Scale (ESS) score (0.0 to 24.0, higher scores indicate more daytime sleepiness, used in study outcomes)

name: functional_outcomes_of_sleep_questionnaire_score
description: Functional Outcomes of Sleep Questionnaire (FOSQ) score (5.0 to 20.0, higher scores indicate greater functioning, used in study outcomes)

name: sleep_time_oxygen_saturation_below_90_percent
description: Percentage of sleep time with oxygen saturation less than 90% (used in study outcomes)

name: device_daily_usage_percentage
description: Self-reported daily usage percentage of the upper airway stimulation device

name: local_coverage_article_id
description: Associated Local Coverage Article ID (A57949 for Billing and Coding)
